channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024030613
item.description:
Report X-2024030613

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-20T15:11:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-13
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE DUE TO THE RATTLE OF AEROSOL CANS. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED (4) 15 OUNCE AEROSOL CANS OF MICROBAN 24 HOUR SANITIZING SPRAY. THERE ARE NO DANGERUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 4785W9, HORTON INC, 301 OCONEE BUSINESS PKWY, WESTMINSTER SC 29693-3157.
